chapter.text: 53|1|Savgand ʙa sitora, on goh ki nopadid savad
53|2|Ki jori sumo [Muhammad] hargiz gumroh nasuda va ʙa rohi taʙohe naaftodaast
53|3|Va az ruji havoi nafs suxan namegujad
53|4|[In Qur'on] Vahj [-i ilohi] ast, ki [ʙa u] ilqo mesavad. In [Qur'on] cuz pand ʙaroi cahonijon [inson va cin] nest
53|5|[Caʙrail, ki faristae ast] Purtavon ta'limas dodaast
53|6|[Hamon faristai] Xusmanzare, ki [ʙo cehrai haqiqias dar ʙaroʙari Pajomʙar] istod
53|7|Dar hole ki u dar ufuqi ʙolo [dar osmon] qaror dost
53|8|Sipas [Caʙrail] nazdik sud; va nazdiktar
53|9|Pas, [fosilai u ʙo Pajomʙar] ʙa andozai tuli du kamon kamtar ʙud
53|10|On goh [on faristai ʙuzurgvor] on ciro, ki ʙojad ʙa ʙandai Alloh taolo vahj mekard, vahj namud
53|11|On ciro, ki [pajomʙar] did, qalʙas duruƣ napindost
53|12|Ojo ʙo u dar ʙorai on ci meʙinad, mucodala mekuned
53|13|Dar haqiqat, pajomʙar jak ʙori digar niz on faristaro [ʙa surati komil] musohida karda ʙud
53|14|Dar kanori [daraxti ʙuzurg] «Sidratu-l-muntaho» [dar osmoni haftum]
53|15|ki oromisgohi ʙihist hamon cost
53|16|On goh ki holate on daraxtro pusonida ʙud
53|17|Casmi [pajomʙar ʙa capu rost] munharif nasud va [az had] tacovuz nakard
53|18|Ba rosti, ki u ʙarxe az ʙuzurgtarin nisonahoi Parvardigorasro [dar on co] musohida kard
53|19|[Ej musrikon] Ojo «Lot»-u «Uzzo»-ro didaed
53|20|Va «Mannot» on savumin [ʙuti ʙearzis]-ro? [Ojo hec sudu zijone ʙa sumo merasonand]
53|21|Ojo [iddao mekuned, ki] farzandi pisar ʙaroi sumost va duxtar ʙaroi Alloh taolo
53|22|Dar in surat, taqsime noodilona ast

53|23|In ʙutho faqat ismhoe [ʙema'no] hastand, ki xud va padaronaton ʙo onho [ma'ʙudhoi duruƣini xudro] nom nihodaed va Alloh taolo hec dalele [ʙar haqqonijati in kor] nozil nakardaast. [Musrikon dar e'tiqodotason] Faqat pajravi gumonu xostahoi dili xesand; hol on ki [muciʙoti] hidojat az coniʙi Parvardigorason ʙar onon rasidaast
53|24|Ojo inson har ci [az safoati in ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] orzu kunad, ʙarojas mujassar ast
53|25|Dunjo va oxirat az oni Alloh ast [va ʙa har kas, har ciro saloh ʙidonad meʙaxsad]
53|26|Ci ʙisjor faristagone, ki dar osmonho hastand, ki safoatason ʙa hec vach sudmand naxohad ʙud; magar pas az on ki Alloh taolo ʙaroi har ki ʙixohad va xusnud ʙosad, icozat dihad
53|27|Kasone, ki ʙa oxirat ʙovar nadorand, ʙar faristagoni ilohi nomi duxtar meguzorand [va ononro duxtaroni Alloh taolo medonand]
53|28|Onon dar mavridi in amr [komilan] ʙeittiloand [va] faqat az hadsu gumon pajravi mekunand; dar hole ki ʙaroi [sinoxti] haqiqat gumon kofi nest
53|29|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] tu niz az kase, ki az jodi Mo ruj gardonida va faqat [lazzathoi] zindagii dunjoro mexohad, ruj ʙartoʙ
53|30|Nihojati darku fahmason hamin ast. Be tardid, Parvardigorat ʙa holi kasone, ki az rohi U munharif sudaand ogohtar ast; va niz ʙa holi rohjoftagon

53|31|Har ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az oni Alloh taolo ast, [rohi xajru sarro ʙa inson iroa kard] to ʙadkoronro dar ʙaroʙari raftorason kajfar dihad va nakukoronro [ʙo ne'mathoi ʙihist] podosi naku ato namojad

53|32|Hamon kasone, ki az gunohoni kaʙira va korhoi zistu ʙesarmona duri mekunand; magar laƣƶishoi kamahamijat [va gunohoni saƣira, ki ʙo tavʙa va iʙodat ʙaxsida mesavand], ki omurzisi Parvardigorat gusturda ast; az hamon dam, ki sumoro az zamin padid ovard va on goh ki ʙa surati canin dar sikami modaronaton ʙuded, ʙa [taʙiati] sumo ogohtar [az xudaton] ast; pas, xudsitoi nakuned, ki U ʙa holi parhezkoron donotar ast
53|33|Ojo on kasero, ki [az haq] ruj ʙartoft, didai
53|34|Va andake infoq kard va [sipas] xuddori namud
53|35|Ojo ilmi ƣajʙ dorad va [ojandaro] meʙinad
53|36|Ojo ʙoxaʙar nasudaast az matoliʙi kitoʙi osmonii Muso
53|37|va [ta'limoti] Iʙrohim, ki haqqi [risolat va ʙandagii Mo]-ro ʙa tamomi ado kard
53|38|Ki hec gunahgore ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus naxohad kasid
53|39|Va in ki inson faqat samarai talos [-u nijati] xudro xohad dost
53|40|Va in ki ʙe gumon talosi u [dar muhosiʙai a'molas dar ruzi qijomat] manzur xohad sud
53|41|On goh podosasro ʙa tamomi xohand dod
53|42|Va in ki ʙozgast [-i hamai umur] ʙa suji Parvardigori tust
53|43|Va Ust, ki mexandonad va megirjonad
53|44|Va Ust, ki memironad va [dar oxirat] zinda mekunad
53|45|Va ham Ust, ki zavci naru modaro meofarad
53|46|az nutfae, ki [dar rahim] rexta mesavad
53|47|va padid ovardani duʙorai onho [dar qijomat niz ʙar uhdai] Alloh taolo ast
53|48|Va Ust, ki [sumoro] ʙenijoz mekunad va sarmoja meʙaxsad
53|49|Va Ust, ki Parvardigori [sitorai] «Si'ro» ast
53|50|Va Ust, ki qavmi Odro dar guzasta halok kard
53|51|Va qavmi Samudro [niz noʙud kard] va [hec jak az ononro] ʙoqi naguzost
53|52|Va qavmi Nuhro, ki sitamgortar va sarkastar ʙudand, pes az on [halok namud]
53|53|Va sahrhoi zerurusuda [-i qavmi Lut]-ro dar ham kuʙid
53|54|Va ononro [ʙo azoʙe farogir] – cunon ki ʙojad pusonid
53|55|Hol [ej inson] dar mavridi kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigorat tardid ravo medori [va mucodala mekuni]
53|56|In [pajomʙar niz] husdordihandaest az [guruhi] husdordihandagoni pesin
53|57|Qijomat nazdik mesavad
53|58|Va hec kas – cuz Alloh taolo – nametavonad oskoras kunad [va saxtihojasro ʙartaraf sozad]
53|59|[Ej musrikon] Ojo az in suxan dar sigifted
53|60|Va dar holi ƣaflat va ƣurur [ʙa ojoti Qur'on] mexanded va [az sunidani husdorhojas nametarsed va] ask namerezed
53|61|Va sumo ʙozikunandagoned
53|62|Pas, [hamagi] ʙaroi Alloh taolo sacda kuned va [tanho] Uro ʙiparasted
